name: Lightness Greed
description:
Lightness Greed is a short adventure and exploration experience.

We encarnate a lighthouse keeper that has found a strange cave under his island. He will embrace this adventure seeking the 3 Crystals that will allow him to obtain the bounty this cave holds.

You must fish and collect treasures in order to obtain gold, that will allow you to buy new ships.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement

E - Interact (Fish / Buy and Sell / ... )

Q - Leave Boat

SHIFT - "Sprint"

Developers:
